text: "Candy and a Currant Bun" is a 1967 song by Pink Floyd and is the B-side to their single Arnold Layne. Its lyrical content is about casual sex and drugs. It was covered by The Mars Volta in 2008. ==References== Category:1967 songs Category:Pink Floyd songs Category:Songs about drugs Category:Psychedelic pop songs
title: Candy and a Currant Bun
